Source.Name: lollypop-portal
Source.Summary: Lollypop flatpak portal (advanced features for Lollypop)
Source.Description: Lollypop portal dbus service allow Lollypop to launch external commands (pa-cmd, kid3-cli, ...) through flatpak sandbox. This service is also used when running without sandbox.
